City Council
============

Hudson City Council is a governing body responsible for making decisions and policies at the local level within the city of Hudson. Its primary role is to represent the interests of the community and ensure the effective functioning of local government.
**\*\*\*The City Council of the City of Hudson meets regularly on the 2nd Thursday of each month at 5:00 pm unless otherwise determined by Council action\*\*\***

May 2, 2026

Hudson City Hall - 3458 Ted Trout Dr. Hudson, TX 75941

**Elected Officials and the year their terms expire:**

Mayor Terry Taliaferro - 2026

Council Member Frankie Ornduff - 2026

Council Member Philip Novak - 2026

Council Member Phil Adkison - 2027

Council Member Juan Ramos - 2027

Council Member Caleb Ramsey - 2027

**Mayor:**
Residence - One (1) year in the State before the filing deadline; One (1) year in the city before election day.

**Council Member:**
Residence - One (1) year in the State before the filing deadline; six months in the city before the filing deadline (Texas Election Code, Section 141.00(a); Brown v. Patterson, 609 SW 2nd 287)

February 14, 2025 @ 5:00 pm

To run for City Council please contact the City Secretary at 936-875-2358 ext. 102
